name: Cronin
description:
Famine grips the land of Edu. Its people starve.
What little food that’s left is hoarded by Lord Yomi, locked away in the depths of Castle Karasu-jo and protected by his cursed scarecrow militia.
But a lone swordsman seeks to challenge Lord Yomi, and take back the food for the people of Edu. The Cronin arrives at Castle Karasu-jo!

Cronin is an arcade-style action game based on iaido (or more accurately that iaido you see in anime). You can slash your way through your scarecrow foes but your attacks won't do any damage until you sheathe your blade. Try and destroy as many enemies as possible in one go for maximum points!

Controller recommended.

This is currently a demo featuring the first 2 levels. All critiques and feedback welcome.
